body:
I tried this solution. Now I get the following messages:

`E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_driver.cc:491] failed call to cuInit: CUresult(-1)`

...

`I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc:185] libcuda reported version is: Not found: was unable to find libcuda.so DSO loaded into this program`

`I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc:356] driver version file contents: """NVRM version: NVIDIA UNIX x86_64 Kernel Module  340.96  Sun Nov  8 22:33:28 PST 2015
`
